previous_headings: Downloading Data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)
title: data-download
text: European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) provides comprehensive record nucleotide sequences associated annotation. ena_download function package offers streamlined way download data ENA using either query accession numbers.

previous_headings: Downloading Data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)
title: data-download
text: using rena package, ensure necessary Java runtime installed local machine ena-file-downloader.jar file inst/extdata/ena-file-downloader/ directory package.

previous_headings: Downloading Data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) > Setup
title: data-download
text: download_type: character specifying type download. Use ‘q’ query-based download ‘’ accession-based download. query: character string containing query retrieve specific data. required using ‘q’ download type. accession: character string containing accession numbers. required using ‘’ download type. format: character string specifying format data download. Valid options ‘READS_FASTQ’, ‘READS_SUBMITTED’, ‘ANALYSIS_SUBMITTED’, ‘ANALYSIS_GENERATED’. location: character string specifying download location. default, uses current working directory. email: character string specifying email address notifications. default, email sent.

previous_headings: Downloading Data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)
title: data-download

previous_headings: Downloading Data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)
title: data-download
text: Files downloaded using function saved specified location provided argument. location specified, files default current working directory. Additionally, execution download command generates update log file logs folder local directory. log captures details build process can invaluable troubleshooting event issues errors download.

what: Bulk Downloads From the ENA FTP File Downloader
title: Bulk Downloads From the ENA FTP File Downloader
text: rena package provides tools bulk downloading read/analysis files ENA via FTP using ena-ftp-downloader. download data European Nucleotide Archive (ENA). function supports two types downloads: Query-based download: Provide query string retrieve specific data. Accession-based download: Provide accession numbers download specific data.

title: Bulk Downloads From the ENA FTP File Downloader
text: can install released version abstr CRAN : Install development version GitHub follows:
code: remotes::install_github("natesheehan/rena") #> Skipping install of 'rena' from a github remote, the SHA1 (8b8bf33d) has not changed since last install. #>   Use `force = TRUE` to force installation library(rena)

title: Bulk Downloads From the ENA FTP File Downloader
text: download_type: character specifying type download. Use ‘q’ query-based download ‘’ accession-based download. query: character string containing query retrieve specific data. required using ‘q’ download type. accession: character string containing accession numbers. required using ‘’ download type. format: character string specifying format data download. Valid options ‘READS_FASTQ’, ‘READS_SUBMITTED’, ‘ANALYSIS_SUBMITTED’, ‘ANALYSIS_GENERATED’. location: character string specifying download location. default, uses current working directory. email: character string specifying email address notifications. default, email sent.

what: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
title: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
text: function allows download data European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) using either query accession numbers.

title: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
code: ena_download(   download_type,   query = NULL,   accession = NULL,   format,   location = getwd(),   email = "NONE" )

title: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
text: download_type character specifying type download: 'q' query '' accession. query character string containing query retrieve specific data (required 'q' download type). accession character string containing accession numbers (required '' download type). format character string specifying format data download. must one : 'READS_FASTQ', 'READS_SUBMITTED', 'ANALYSIS_SUBMITTED', 'ANALYSIS_GENERATED'. location character string specifying download location (default current working directory). email character string specifying email address notifications (default "NONE").

title: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
text: None (downloads data specified location)

title: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
text: function downloads data ENA using ENA file downloader tool. supports two types downloads: - Query-based download ('q'): provide query string retrieve specific data. - Accession-based download (''): provide accession numbers download specific data.

title: Download data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) — ena_download
code: # Download data using a query q = "result=read_run&query=country=%22Japan%22AND%20depth=168" ena_download("q", query = q, format = "READS_FASTQ")  # Download data using accession numbers ena_download("a", accession = "SAMEA3231268,SAMEA3231287", format = "READS_FASTQ")
